mapper.update: update admitbuy set scheduleid = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, managePerson = #{manageperson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adviserid = #{adviserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clientid = #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payWayid = #{paywayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, houseid = #{houseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firstPay = #{firstpay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, admitbuyDate = #{admitbuydate,jdbcType=DATE} where admitBuyid = #{admitbuyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select admitBuyid, scheduleid, managePerson, adviserid, clientid, payWayid, houseid, firstPay, admitbuyDate from admitbuy where admitBuyid = #{admitbuyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.admitBuyid,h.houseName,c.clientName from admitbuy a left join house h on a.houseid=h.houseid left join client c on a.clientid=c.clientid
and clientid=(select clientid from client where clientName=#{clientName})
and houseid=(select houseid from house where houseName=#{houseName})
